    <div class="docs markdown"><div class="pilwrap" id="tw-animate-css">
  <h1>
    <a href="#tw-animate-css" name="tw-animate-css" class="pilcrow"></a>
tw-animate-css
  </h1>
</div>
<p><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/tw-animate-css"><img src="https://img.shields.io/npm/v/tw-animate-css?color=red&amp;logo=npm" alt="npm version"></a>
<a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/tw-animate-css"><img src="https://img.shields.io/npm/dt/tw-animate-css?color=red&amp;logo=npm" alt="npm downloads"></a>
<a href=".html"><img src="https://img.shields.io/github/license/Wombosvideo/tw-animate-css" alt="MIT license"></a>
<a href="https://github.com/Wombosvideo/tw-animate-css"><img src="https://img.shields.io/github/stars/Wombosvideo/tw-animate-css?color=blue" alt="GitHub stars"></a></p>
<p>A collection of Tailwind CSS v4.0 utilities for creating beautiful animations. Includes ready-to-use animations <code>accordion-down</code>, <code>accordion-up</code> and <code>caret-blink</code>, as well as a set of utilities for creating your own animations.</p>
<hr>
<p>This package is a replacement for <a href="https://github.com/jamiebuilds/tailwindcss-animate"><code>tailwindcss-animate</code></a>. It embraces the new <a href="https://tailwindcss.com/docs/adding-custom-styles#adding-custom-utilities">CSS-first architecture</a>, providing a pure CSS solution for adding animation capabilities to your Tailwind CSS project without relying on the legacy JavaScript plugin system or having to define all keywords from scratch.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>[!WARNING]
The upcoming release v2.0.0 will include breaking changes. A migration script and a guide will be provided to help you transition smoothly.</p>
</blockquote>

<div class="pilwrap" id="getting-started">
  <h2>
    <a href="#getting-started" name="getting-started" class="pilcrow"></a>
Getting Started
  </h2>
</div>
<div class="pilwrap" id="npm">
  <h3>
    <a href="#npm" name="npm" class="pilcrow"></a>
NPM
  </h3>
</div>
<ol>
<li>
<p>Install the package with <code>npm</code>:</p>
<pre><code class="sh">npm install -D tw-animate-css
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Add the following line to your <code>app.css</code> or <code>globals.css</code> file:</p>
<pre><code class="css"><span class="hljs-keyword">@import</span> <span class="hljs-string">"tw-animate-css"</span>;
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Start using the animations!</p>
<pre><code class="html"><span class="hljs-comment">&lt;!-- Add an animated fade and zoom entrance --&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"animate-in fade-in zoom-in"</span>&gt;</span>...<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">&lt;!-- Add an animated slide to top-left exit --&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"animate-out slide-out-to-top slide-out-to-left"</span>&gt;</span>...<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">&lt;!-- Control animation duration --&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"... duration-300"</span>&gt;</span>...<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">&lt;!-- Control animation delay --&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"... delay-150"</span>&gt;</span>...<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">&lt;!-- And so much more! --&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
</li>
</ol>
<blockquote>
<p>ℹ️ <strong>NOTE</strong><br>
The above guide works for esbuild, Vite and probably other bundlers too. If you are using a different bundler, the syntax may differ. <a href="https://github.com/Wombosvideo/tw-animate-css/issues/new">Let me know</a> how it works and I'll update the documentation.</p>
</blockquote>
<div class="pilwrap" id="manual-download">
  <h3>
    <a href="#manual-download" name="manual-download" class="pilcrow"></a>
Manual Download
  </h3>
</div>
<ol>
<li>
<p>Download the <a href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Wombosvideo/tw-animate-css/refs/heads/main/src/tw-animate.css"><code>tw-animate.css</code></a>
file from GitHub and place it next to your <code>app.css</code> or <code>globals.css</code> file.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Add the following line to your <code>app.css</code> or <code>globals.css</code> file:</p>
<pre><code class="css"><span class="hljs-keyword">@import</span> <span class="hljs-string">"./tw-animate.css"</span>;
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Start using the animations!</p>
<pre><code class="html"><span class="hljs-comment">&lt;!-- Add an animated fade and zoom entrance --&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"animate-in fade-in zoom-in"</span>&gt;</span>...<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">&lt;!-- Add an animated slide to top-left exit --&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"animate-out slide-out-to-top slide-out-to-left"</span>&gt;</span>...<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">&lt;!-- Control animation duration --&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"... duration-300"</span>&gt;</span>...<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">&lt;!-- Control animation delay --&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"... delay-150"</span>&gt;</span>...<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">&lt;!-- And so much more! --&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="pilwrap" id="usage">
  <h2>
    <a href="#usage" name="usage" class="pilcrow"></a>
Usage
  </h2>
</div>
<div class="pilwrap" id="enterexit-animations">
  <h3>
    <a href="#enterexit-animations" name="enterexit-animations" class="pilcrow"></a>
Enter/Exit Animations
  </h3>
</div>
<p>To keep the README concise, I'll define a few variables:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>&lt;io&gt;</code>: Specify the type of animation. This can be <code>in</code> for enter or <code>out</code> for exit animations.</li>
<li><code>&lt;dir&gt;</code>: Specify the direction of the slide. This can be <code>in-from-top</code>, <code>in-from-bottom</code>, <code>in-from-left</code>, <code>in-from-right</code>, <code>in-from-start</code>, <code>in-from-end</code>, <code>out-to-top</code>, <code>out-to-bottom</code>, <code>out-to-left</code>, <code>out-to-right</code>, <code>out-to-start</code>, or <code>out-to-end</code>.</li>
<li><code>*</code>: Specify a value to apply. See list of possible values.</li>
</ul>
<div class="pilwrap" id="base-classes">
  <h4>
    <a href="#base-classes" name="base-classes" class="pilcrow"></a>
Base Classes
  </h4>
</div>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Class</th>
<th>Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/animations/in-out.md.html"><code>animate-&lt;io&gt;</code></a></td>
<td>Base class for enter/exit animations. This needs to be applied in order for enter/exit animations to work.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<div class="pilwrap" id="parameter-classes">
  <h4>
    <a href="#parameter-classes" name="parameter-classes" class="pilcrow"></a>
Parameter Classes
  </h4>
</div>
<p>To customize the animation parameters, use the following classes:</p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Class</th>
<th>Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/parameters/animation-duration.md.html"><code>duration-*</code></a></td>
<td>Sets <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/animation-duration"><code>animation-duration</code></a>. Uses <code>--tw-duration</code>, see <a href="https://tailwindcss.com/docs/transition-duration">Tailwind CSS docs</a>. Defaults to <code>duration-150</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/parameters/animation-timing-function.md.html"><code>ease-*</code></a></td>
<td>Sets <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/animation-timing-function"><code>animation-timing-function</code></a>. Uses <code>--tw-ease</code>, see <a href="https://tailwindcss.com/docs/transition-timing-function">Tailwind CSS docs</a>. Defaults to <code>ease-[ease]</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/parameters/animation-delay.md.html"><code>delay-*</code></a></td>
<td>Sets <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/animation-delay"><code>animation-delay</code></a>. Possible values: Any <code>&lt;number&gt;</code>, <code>initial</code>, or any other <code>[&lt;value&gt;]</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/parameters/animation-iteration-count.md.html"><code>repeat-*</code></a></td>
<td>Sets <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/animation-iteration-count"><code>animation-iteration-count</code></a>. Possible values: Any <code>&lt;number&gt;</code>, <code>infinite</code>, <code>initial</code> or any other <code>[&lt;value&gt;]</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/parameters/animation-direction.md.html"><code>direction-*</code></a></td>
<td>Sets <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/animation-direction"><code>animation-direction</code></a>. Possible values: <code>normal</code>, <code>reverse</code>, <code>alternate</code>, <code>alternate-reverse</code>, <code>initial</code> or any other <code>[&lt;value&gt;]</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/parameters/animation-fill-mode.md.html"><code>fill-mode-*</code></a></td>
<td>Sets <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/animation-fill-mode"><code>animation-fill-mode</code></a>. Possible values: <code>none</code>, <code>forwards</code>, <code>backwards</code>, <code>both</code>, <code>initial</code> or any other <code>[&lt;value&gt;]</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/parameters/animation-play-state.md#running.html"><code>running</code></a></td>
<td>Sets <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/animation-play-state"><code>animation-play-state</code></a> to <code>running</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/parameters/animation-play-state.md#paused.html"><code>paused</code></a></td>
<td>Sets <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/animation-play-state"><code>animation-play-state</code></a> to <code>paused</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/parameters/animation-play-state.md#play-state-.html"><code>play-state-*</code></a></td>
<td>Sets <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/animation-play-state"><code>animation-play-state</code></a>. Possible values: <code>initial</code> or any other <code>[&lt;value&gt;]</code>.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<div class="pilwrap" id="transform-classes">
  <h4>
    <a href="#transform-classes" name="transform-classes" class="pilcrow"></a>
Transform Classes
  </h4>
</div>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Class</th>
<th>Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/transforms/blur.md.html"><code>blur-in-*</code></a></td>
<td>Applies a blur effect on the element when it enters. Possible values: <code>blur-in</code>, <code>blur-in-&lt;number&gt;</code>, <code>blur-in-(&lt;custom-property&gt;)</code>, or <code>blur-in-[&lt;value&gt;]</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/transforms/blur.md.html"><code>blur-out-*</code></a></td>
<td>Applies a blur effect on the element when it exits. Possible values: <code>blur-out</code>, <code>blur-out-&lt;number&gt;</code>, <code>blur-out-(&lt;custom-property&gt;)</code>, or <code>blur-out-[&lt;value&gt;]</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/transforms/opacity.md.html"><code>fade-&lt;io&gt;</code></a></td>
<td>Fades the element in from or out to <code>opacity: 0</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/transforms/opacity.md.html"><code>fade-&lt;io&gt;-*</code></a></td>
<td>Fades the element in from or out to the specified value. Possible values: Any <code>&lt;number&gt;</code> (percentage) or any other <code>[&lt;value&gt;]</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/transforms/scale.md.html"><code>zoom-&lt;io&gt;</code></a></td>
<td>Zooms the element in from or out to <code>scale3D(0,0,0)</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/transforms/scale.md.html"><code>zoom-&lt;io&gt;-*</code></a></td>
<td>Zooms the element in from or out to the specified value. Possible values: Any <code>&lt;number&gt;</code> (percentage) or any other <code>[&lt;value&gt;]</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/transforms/rotate.md.html"><code>spin-&lt;io&gt;</code></a></td>
<td>Spins the element in from or out to <code>rotate(30deg)</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/transforms/rotate.md.html"><code>spin-&lt;io&gt;-*</code></a></td>
<td>Spins the element in from or out to the specified value. Possible values: Any <code>&lt;number&gt;</code> (degrees) or any other <code>[&lt;value&gt;]</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/transforms/translate.md.html"><code>slide-&lt;dir&gt;</code></a></td>
<td>Slides the element in from or out to the specified direction (<code>100%</code>).</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/transforms/translate.md.html"><code>slide-&lt;dir&gt;-*</code></a></td>
<td>Slides the element in from or out to the specified value. Possible values: Any <code>&lt;number&gt;</code> (percentage) or any other <code>[&lt;value&gt;]</code>.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<div class="pilwrap" id="ready-to-use-animations">
  <h3>
    <a href="#ready-to-use-animations" name="ready-to-use-animations" class="pilcrow"></a>
Ready-to-Use Animations
  </h3>
</div>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Class</th>
<th>Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/animations/accordion.md.html"><code>accordion-down</code></a></td>
<td>Accordion down animation. Requires <code>--radix-accordion-content-height</code> or one of the <a href="./docs/animations/accordion.md#setting-content-height.html">other accordion content height variables</a> to be set to the content's height.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/animations/accordion.md.html"><code>accordion-up</code></a></td>
<td>Accordion up animation. Requires <code>--radix-accordion-content-height</code> or one of the <a href="./docs/animations/accordion.md#setting-content-height.html">other accordion content height variables</a> to be set to the content's height.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/animations/collapsible.md.html"><code>collapsible-down</code></a></td>
<td>Collapsible down animation. Requires <code>--radix-collapsible-content-height</code> or one of the <a href="./docs/animations/collapsible.md#setting-content-height.html">other collapsible content height variables</a> to be set to the content's height.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/animations/collapsible.md.html"><code>collapsible-up</code></a></td>
<td>Collapsible up animation. Requires <code>--radix-collapsible-content-height</code> or one of the <a href="./docs/animations/collapsible.md#setting-content-height.html">other collapsible content height variables</a> to be set to the content's height.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="./docs/animations/caret-blink.md.html"><code>caret-blink</code></a></td>
<td>Blinking animation for caret/cursor.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p>By the way, if you don't use some of the above animations, they will not be included in the final CSS file. This is because Tailwind CSS kind of does tree-shaking for you. So, if you don't use <code>accordion-down</code>, it won't be included in the final CSS file.</p>
<div class="pilwrap" id="examples">
  <h2>
    <a href="#examples" name="examples" class="pilcrow"></a>
Examples
  </h2>
</div>
<p><strong>Basic usage:</strong></p>
<pre><code class="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"animate-in fade-in slide-in-from-top-8 duration-500"</span>&gt;</span>
  Fade in from 0% opacity,<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">br</span> /&gt;</span>
  slide from top by 8 spacing units (2rem),<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">br</span> /&gt;</span>
  with a 500ms duration.
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p><strong>Advanced usage:</strong></p>
<pre><code class="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"data-[state=show]:animate-in data-[state=hide]:animate-out fade-in slide-in-from-top-8 fade-out slide-out-to-top-8 duration-500"</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">data-state</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"show"</span>
&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">p</span>&gt;</span>
    If the element has the <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span>data-state="show"<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span> attribute,<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">br</span> /&gt;</span>
    fade in from 0% opacity,<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">br</span> /&gt;</span>
    slide from top by 8 spacing units (2rem),<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">br</span> /&gt;</span>
    with a 500ms duration.
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">p</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">p</span>&gt;</span>
    If the element has the <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span>data-state="hide"<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span> attribute,<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">br</span> /&gt;</span>
    fade out to 0% opacity,<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">br</span> /&gt;</span>
    slide to top by 8 spacing units (2rem),<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">br</span> /&gt;</span>
    with a 500ms duration.
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">p</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<div class="pilwrap" id="notes-on-compatibility">
  <h2>
    <a href="#notes-on-compatibility" name="notes-on-compatibility" class="pilcrow"></a>
Notes on Compatibility
  </h2>
</div>
<blockquote>
<p>ℹ️ <strong>NOTE</strong><br>
I use only a small portion of the original plugin, so it might not be a 100% compatible drop-in replacement. If you notice any inconsistencies, feel free to contribute to this repository by opening a pull-request.</p>
</blockquote>
